content.text:
# Draft:Edward Fair

----
Edward D. Fair born May 2, 1959 to Donald and Ruby Fair, Canfield, Oh. In 2025 he started writing as an author and has published in many genre. From Christian, Woman Romance, Memoirs, Mystery and more.
His books are available on Amazon, Barnes and Nobel and many other outlets. His books include “The Christmas Bell Ringer”, “A Bitter Tea”, “One Good Eye, One Blind Eye: A Difficult Life”, and more.
References
Amazon.com authoredwardfair.com Barnes and Nobel
